Notes: The new directive means that gatherings of 10 people or less are no longer allowed in San Diego County, unless they live in same household.
San Diego is one of few counties that start in Red Tier

Category: Regional Stay at Home Order Lifted
Notes: Officials with the California Department of Public Health (CDPH) Monday ended the Regional Stay-at-Home Order, lifting the order for all regions statewide,
San Diego Schools reopen. Some schools 4 days a week, some hybrid 2 days a week. Online still optional.
